articles.author: Malcolm Moore, Nic Fildes
articles.title: BP turns to outsider Meg O’Neill to simplify sprawling empire - Financial Times
articles.description: Woodside Energy boss who clashed with climate campaigners in Australia is taking one of the industry’s toughest jobs

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Mourners grieve 10-year-old slain in Bondi mass shooting as Australia's leader pledges new hate laws - NPR
articles.description: Hundreds of mourners bearing bright bouquets and clutching each other in grief gathered at a funeral in Sydney on Thursday for a 10-year-old girl who was gunned down in an antisemitic massacre during a Hanukkah celebration at Bondi Beach.
articles.content: SYDNEY Hundreds of mourners bearing bright bouquets and clutching each other in grief gathered at a funeral in Sydney on Thursday for a 10-year-old girl who was gunned down in an antisemitic massacre… [+6173 chars]
